When he arrives, most of crew has disappeared, and Chris is visited by a replica of his late wife who is imbued with her memories. Remake of the acclaimed 1972 film and adapted from Stanislaw Lem's novel. (repeat) (cc)

programme.title: Panic Room
programme.desc: A mother and her diabetic preteen daughter hide in a fortified, high-tech, hidden chamber when thieves break into their New York City home, but more problems arise after they leave behind the girl's medications. (repeat) (cc)

programme.title: The Sweetest Thing
programme.desc: Christina and her friend Courtney go on a road trip to find Peter - the disappearing Mr Right - encountering wild and hilarious misadventures along the way. (repeat) (cc)

programme.title: Catch Me if You Can
programme.desc: A charming 1960s con man poses as a pilot, a doctor and a lawyer while eluding a dogged FBI agent who is determined to put him behind bars. Later, the swindler falls in love with the daughter of the District Attorney of New Orleans, LA. (repeat) (cc)

programme.title: Good Will Hunting
programme.desc: An Oscar-winning screenplay by costars Matt Damon and Ben Affleck propels this tale about a brilliant but undisciplined janitor who confronts his problems with the help of a therapist (Robin Williams, who also won an Oscar). (repeat) (cc)

programme.title: Fast Times at Ridgemont High
programme.desc: A study of adolescent obsession with sex, drugs, and rock and roll has a girl seeking romance advice from an upperclassman on how to get a boy to notice her; and a stoner feuding with a teacher. (repeat) (cc)

programme.title: The Breakfast Club
programme.desc: Five high-school students from different cliques spend a day-long detention together, and discover that they have more in common then they ever expected. (repeat) (cc)

programme.title: Sixteen Candles
programme.desc: A girl's sixteenth birthday is forgotten by her family who are distracted by the upcoming wedding of her older sister, and to compound things, she has a crush on a popular older classmate and is suffering the unwanted attentions of a sophomoric geek. (repeat) (cc)

programme.title: The Sweetest Thing
programme.desc: Christina and her friend Courtney go on a road trip to find Peter - the disappearing Mr Right - encountering wild and hilarious misadventures along the way. (repeat) (cc)

programme.title: Trade
programme.desc: Prurient exposé of Mexico's sex-trafficking underworld, centering on the search for a 13-year-old girl who is abducted by Russian slave traders in Mexico City. (cc)(c)

programme.title: The Express
programme.desc: Fact-based sports biopic stars Rob Brown as Syracuse University running back Ernie Davis, the first African-American to win the Heisman Trophy as the outstanding college-football player. Dennis Quaid costars as Syracuse coach Ben Schwartzwalder. Directed by Gary Fleder. (repeat) (cc)

programme.title: Cocoon
programme.desc: Senior citizens at a Florida retirement home stumble upon a fountain of youth created by aliens. Based on the best-selling novel by David Saperstein. (repeat) (cc)

programme.title: The Man Without a Face
programme.desc: A disfigured outcast forms a close bond with an emotionally neglected 12-year-old. Based on the novel by Isabelle Holland. (repeat) (cc)

programme.title: Thirteen
programme.desc: An impressionable teen is lured into a life of sex, drugs and crime when she befriends a charismatic classmate. Harrowingly realistic, but may be too intense for some viewers. (repeat) (cc)

programme.title: Almost Christmas
programme.desc: An African-American widower asks his family to join him for their first Christmas since his wife passed away. However, having all of them under one roof leads to a number of personal confrontations as secrets are revealed and marriages are tested. (repeat) (cc)

programme.title: Popstar Never Stop Never Stopping
programme.desc: A hugely popular rapper faces a career meltdown when his latest album tanks and his attempts to rehab his image only end in disaster. In time, he considers reuniting with his old rap trio, the Style Boyz. (repeat) (cc)

programme.title: Austin Powers The Spy Who Shagged Me

programme.title: The Big Lebowski
programme.desc: A slacker known to his friends as "The Dude" gets mixed up in a convoluted kidnapping plot with an eccentric millionaire whose name he shares. (repeat) (cc)

programme.title: Jackie

programme.title: Room 104

programme.title: Popstar Never Stop Never Stopping
programme.desc: A hugely popular rapper faces a career meltdown when his latest album tanks and his attempts to rehab his image only end in disaster. In time, he considers reuniting with his old rap trio, the Style Boyz. (repeat) (cc)(n)

programme.title: Victor Frankenstein

programme.title: Lara Croft Tomb Raider
programme.desc: A sexy video-game goddess battles villainous forces while racing to recover an ancient magical artifact that has the power to control time and space. (repeat) (cc)(n)

programme.title: The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy

programme.title: Patria O Muerte Cuba, Fatherland or Death
programme.desc: A look at social, economic and cultural conditions in Cuba in the 21st century as they're experienced by artists, activists, writers, musicians and other ordinary citizens who struggle in their everyday lives. (repeat) (cc)(n)

programme.title: Mr. Woodcock

programme.title: Jennifer Lopez Dance Again
programme.desc: A chronicle of Jennifer Lopez's first world tour, in 2012, features performances of "Get Right," "Love Don't Cost a Thing," "I'm Into You," "Let's Get Loud," "On the Floor," "Do It Well" and "Dance Again." programme.title: Deceived
programme.desc: A Manhattan art restorer who believes she has the perfect marriage uncovers secrets about her husband after his mysterious death. Her sleuthing threatens to bring about her own demise. (repeat) (cc)(n)

programme.title: The Accountant
programme.desc: A math genius works as a financial consultant for criminal organizations. (repeat) (cc)(n)

programme.title: Her
programme.desc: A lonely writer falls for his computer's operating system, which has the voice of a woman and the ability to grow and learn. (repeat) (cc)(n)

programme.title: Kinsey
programme.desc: Provocative, intelligent biopic starring Liam Neeson as pioneering sex researcher Alfred Kinsey and Laura Linney as his freethinking wife. Chris O'Donnell, Peter Sarsgaard, Timothy Hutton, John Lithgow, Tim Curry. Directed by Bill Condon. (repeat) (cc)(n)

programme.title: Keeping Up With the Joneses
programme.desc: An ordinary suburban couple discover that their hospitable new neighbors are actually government spies. Soon, all four of them are caught up in an international espionage imbroglio. (repeat) (cc)(n)

programme.title: Insecure
programme.desc: Tensions run high during Derek and Tiffany's dinner party; Molly rethinks her future after being forced to come to terms with her romantic realities; Issa tries to make amends with Frieda. (repeat) (cc)(n)

programme.title: Sex and the City
programme.desc: The romantic adventures of a fashionable New York City writer and her three chic friends continue in this movie adaptation of the popular HBO series. (repeat) (cc)(n)

programme.title: Die Hard
programme.desc: NYC cop John McClane fights terrorists in an L.A. high-rise in a bid to rescue his estranged wife, who happens to be one of the hostages. Meanwhile, the terrorists attempt to steal $600 million from a high-tech safe. (cc)

programme.title: Criminal
programme.desc: Sociopathic death-row inmate Jerico Stewart is implanted with the memories of a deceased CIA agent in a desperate attempt to thwart a deadly plot. At the same time, Jerico reconnects with his own humanity as he bonds with the late agent's family. (cc)

programme.title: Ugly

programme.title: I Am Legend

programme.title: Banshee
programme.desc: Lucas and Carrie investigate the tunnels under Camp Genoa, while Proctor and Rebecca engage in a territorial dispute with a pair of rival drug dealers. Later, Lucas and his new deputy pay an unwelcome visit to a Kinaho bar; and Gordon resolves to turn around his life. (cc)

programme.title: Banshee
programme.desc: An FBI agent arrests Lucas, threatening to reveal his secret, but both men wind up having a run-in with a ruthless mob kingpin. Meanwhile, Tommy Littlestone disobeys Chayton's orders and launches a strike against Proctor; and Nola Longshadow seeks revenge against Burton. (cc)

programme.title: Banshee

programme.title: Banshee
programme.desc: Looking to avenge Tommy's death, Chayton and a band of Redbones invade Banshee, while Proctor, stuck in the Cadi with Lucas and his deputies, is concerned about his ailing mother at home alone. (cc)

programme.title: Banshee
programme.sub-title: We Were All Someone Else Yesterday

programme.title: Banshee
programme.sub-title: You Can't Hide From the Dead
programme.desc: Regardless of Job's concern, Lucas and gang engineer a heist at Camp Genoa; Gordon and Carrie call a truce and team up for an unconventional intervention with Deva; Rebecca sneaks off to Philadelphia to rekindle a deal with her uncle's spurned client. (cc)

programme.title: Banshee
programme.sub-title: All the Wisdom I Got Left

programme.title: Banshee
programme.sub-title: Even God Doesn't Know What to Make of You

programme.title: Banshee
programme.desc: In the Season 3 finale, Lucas recalls a furtive chapter in his life; and a fan of Job's work offers him special treatment. programme.title: Banshee
programme.desc: In the Season 4 premiere, Lucas gets involved with a vicious serial killer. (cc)

programme.desc: Carrie turns vigilante, while Brock suspects Lucas in the serial killings. (cc)

programme.desc: Lucas and Carrie make a desperate attempt to find Job and enlist help from Fat Au. (cc)

programme.sub-title: Innocent Might Be a Bit of a Stretch

programme.title: Banshee
programme.sub-title: A Little Late to Grow a Pair

programme.sub-title: Only One Way a Dogfight Ends

programme.sub-title: Truths Other Than the Ones You Tell Yourself
programme.desc: Worried that Dawson's safety is threatened, Lucas and Brock increase efforts to track hunt down Bode; as the Brotherhood preps for war with Proctor, Kurt tries to keep Maggie safe, while Calvin unloads his frustrations at the office; and Job settles matters with a Camp Genoa adversary. (cc)

programme.title: Banshee
programme.desc: In the series finale, Lucas decides to leave Banshee, but discovers the murder case he believed closed may be reopened, while Proctor looks to finalize a deal with the Colombians after his intense faceoff with the Brotherhood. Carrie enacts one final act of vengeance; and Brock demands Bunker pledge his allegiance. (cc)

programme.title: Wyatt Earp
programme.desc: Character study of the legendary lawman details the future marshal's childhood and his father's attempts to instill a love of family and the law in his son. As an adult, a tragedy triggers a drunken downward spiral that leads to exploits as a gunslinger. Ultimately, Earp finds redemption as a lawman. (cc)

programme.title: High Anxiety
programme.desc: A renowned Harvard psychiatrist (with a concealed fear of heights) takes over as director of the PsychoNeurotic Institute for the Very, Very Nervous after the last administrator dies under suspicious circumstances. Mel Brooks directed, co-wrote and plays the head shrink in this homage to Alfred Hitchcock films. (cc)

programme.title: Win a Date With Tad Hamilton!
programme.desc: A movie star with a bad-boy reputation is convinced by his manager to hold a dating contest to help improve his image. After winning the contest, a clerk from a small town discovers that both the actor and a co-worker are vying for her affection. She finds herself in the middle of a love triangle between her closest friend and a dream date. (cc)

programme.title: How to Be Single
programme.desc: Four women with very different ideas about love and relationships navigate the single life of NYC. Two friends set out on a journey of self-discovery, while a career gal struggles with settling down and an uptight romantic searches for her perfect match. (cc)

programme.title: Domestic Disturbance
programme.desc: A divorced boat builder discovers that his preteen son's stepdad is masking an evil side, forcing him to desperately try to protect his ex-wife and son from the new man in their lives. (cc)

programme.title: The Postman
programme.desc: A wanderer disguises himself as a postman in a post-apocalyptic town headed by a sadistic brute. The stranger's arrival brings hope to the downtrodden townspeople, who are ready to revolt against their tyrannical leader. (cc)

programme.title: The Fast and the Furious
programme.desc: A young FBI agent goes undercover to investigate a series of hijackings. Rapidly becoming involved in gang activity, including late-night car races, he begins to relate with his subjects and finds himself falling in love with the gang leader's sister. (cc)

programme.title: Demolition
programme.desc: An investment banker copes with his wife's sudden death by dismantling the machines surrounding him. Meanwhile, his complaints to a vending-machine company spark an unexpected relationship with a customer-service rep. (cc)

programme.title: Bridget Jones The Edge of Reason
programme.desc: Sequel in which Bridget worries about her relationship with Darcy and is upset when work reunites her with the womanizing Daniel. (cc)(n)

programme.desc: Conclusion. The reunion continues with Masika and Hazel facing off. Later, Willie and Kyesha's texts are revealed; Rosa accuses Safaree of being cheap; and Moniece makes a shocking allegation that one of the guys has a child with a mistress. (repeat)

programme.title: Love & Hip Hop Hollywood
programme.desc: In the Season 4 premiere, Keyshia Cole confronts unresolved issues with her estranged husband, Booby; chaos erupts when Hazel-E squares off against her haters; a sexy new arrival threatens to turn Masika's world upside-down; and Teairra has a lunch date. (repeat)

programme.title: Love & Hip Hop Hollywood
programme.desc: Ray J's struggle to start a family leads to an outrageous bet with A1 and Safaree; Keyshia gets advice from Too Short; Nikki Baby connects Chanel West Coast with a producer; and Brooke goes on a mission to uncover the truth about Ma. (repeat)

programme.title: Love & Hip Hop Hollywood
programme.desc: Teairra's new man clashes with her social circle; Chanel leaps to her friend's defense at Safaree's party; Ray J's secret weighs on his conscience; Lyrica issues a startling demand to A1; and Alexis and Solo's relationship hits a snag. (repeat)

programme.title: Love & Hip Hop Hollywood
programme.desc: Masika hires Misster Ray to plan an event, only to get caught in the crossfire; concerns mount over Teairra's self-destructive behavior; A1 considers a collaboration with Keyshia Cole; and Brooke and Booby hatch a plan to teach Marcus a lesson. (repeat)

programme.title: Love & Hip Hop Hollywood
programme.desc: Mayhem erupts at Safaree and Chanel's music video shoot. Misster Ray's attempt to make nice with Masika leads to a wild encounter with Zell. A betrayed Teairra lashes out at Cisco, Moniece, and Nia. (repeat)

programme.title: Love & Hip Hop Hollywood
programme.desc: Shocking allegations blow up Masika and Nia's dinner for Zell and Misster Ray. Teairra and Cisco's shopping trip ends in tears. Moniece struggles with "the other woman" in her relationship. Booby worries about Keyshia's response to his latest move. (repeat)

programme.title: Love & Hip Hop Hollywood
programme.desc: The Hollywood women are forced to pick sides in a war between cliques; Ray J's effort to develop a sexy new image for Bridget Kelly puts a strain on his marriage; and Moniece squares off with A.D.'s best friend. (repeat)

programme.desc: Mixed feelings about the baby's arrival: Vivian feels like she's having triplets, Geoffrey feels overwhelmed and Ashley feels invisible. Shantay: Marjean Holden. Shaquille: DeVaughn Nixon. (repeat)

programme.title: My Wife and Kids
programme.desc: Vanessa (Brooklyn Sudano) has her ultrasound, but doesn't want to know the baby's sex. Neither does Jr. Only Michael wants to know. Meanwhile, Kady is enamored of a young dancer named Smilin' Willie (Elliot Cho). This upsets not only Franklin (Noah Gray-Cabey), but Claire as well. It seems that Willie has a crush on her, and won't leave her alone. Jasmine: Ella Joyce. Calvin: Rasta. (repeat)

programme.title: My Wife and Kids
programme.desc: Jay's training hard to run a marathon; Michael not so hard ("I'm on my regimen---it's called the eat, drink and be merry regimen"). Meanwhile, Tony (Andrew McFarlane) is feeling incredibly guilty because he finds Clare "incredibly sexy." (repeat)

programme.title: My Wife and Kids
programme.desc: Michael and Jay go out for the evening without reciting “the rules” to Claire. That means it's party time, and the party animal turns out to be Claire's usually pious boyfriend Tony (Andrew McFarlane). (repeat)

programme.title: My Wife and Kids
programme.desc: E Street Band saxman Clarence Clemons guests as a jazz performer who went to school with Michael, who suddenly claims he's a pianist (albeit a rusty one). programme.title: The Wayans Bros.
programme.desc: Pops lands a gig as the Ghetto Gourmet on TV. But with Marlon as his assistant, what's cooking is the show's goose. Meanwhile, street hustler T.C. becomes a security guard. Ken: Gary Beach. Kiki: Heather Lee. (repeat)

programme.title: The Wayans Bros.
programme.desc: Marlon (Marlon Wayans) takes the credit when Shawn saves a boy's life, and the public adulation goes to his head, which is soon filled with visions of his own line of action figures. Sylvia: Gretchen Palmer. (repeat)

programme.title: The Wayans Bros.
programme.desc: When Dee falls for a smooth-talking con man, Shawn and Marlon must find a way to open her eyes before the wedding. Roland: Marc Gomes. Dee: Anna Maria Horsford. Stacey: Roxanne Beckford. Marlon: Marlon Wayans. (repeat)

programme.sub-title: The Lady Is Not a Tramp

programme.title: My Wife and Kids
programme.desc: There's a mouse in the house (and doggerel in the script). Is Michael man enough to catch it? Hardly. “He's a genius,” he admits, “an evil, conniving genius.” But there might be a better mousetrap in the Kyle household: Claire, who's inadvertently wreaking havoc on any wildlife she encounters. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: My Wife and Kids
programme.desc: Jr. decides it's time to move out of the garage and into a place of his own, a “humble abode,” he calls it. “Very humble,” Michael notes on his first inspection. Just how bad is the neighborhood? “He could go out for a quart of milk and end up on the carton,” says Jay. John/Granny: Damon Wayans Jr. Jasmine: Ella Joyce. Calvin: Rasta. Realtor: T'Keyah Crystal Keyma'h. Dexter: Lamont Johnson. Vanessa: Brooklyn Sudano. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: My Wife and Kids
programme.desc: It's candy-sale time at Kady's school and Jay won't help because she's dieting. So Michael steps in. Kady: Parker McKenna Posey. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: Zranione uczucia
programme.desc: Mała Rita (Mel Maia) w dramatycznych okolicznościach traci ojca. Bezwzględna macocha (Adriana Esteves) i jej przyjaciel porzucają ją na wysypisku śmieci, gdzie musi walczyć o przetrwanie. Tam nawiązuje liczne przyjaźnie i odnajduje miłość swojego życia. Wkrótce zostaje adoptowana przez małżeństwo z Argentyny. Po wielu latach już dorosła Rita (Débora Falabella), pod imieniem Nina, wraca w rodzinne strony, by zemścić się za krzywdy z przeszłości

programme.title: Prognoza pogody
programme.desc: "Prognoza pogody" jest nadawanym cyklicznie przez stację Nowa TV programem, w którym widzowie mogą zapoznać się z zapowiedziami meteorologów dotyczącymi nadchodzących dni. W każdym wydaniu prowadzący informują, jakiej temperatury należy się spodziewać w najbliższym czasie, jakie może być zachmurzenie i czy spodziewane są opady. BR"Prognoza pogody" emitowana jest w stacji Nowa TV codziennie zaraz po zakończeniu programu informacyjnego "24 godziny". Kolejne wydania prowadzi na zmianę trójka prezenterów: Aleksandra Kot, Paulina Koziejowska i Jarosław Kret. Prognozę dla Nowej TV przygotowuje Biuro Prognoz Aura

programme.desc: "Prognoza pogody" jest nadawanym cyklicznie przez stację Nowa TV programem, w którym widzowie mogą zapoznać się z zapowiedziami meteorologów dotyczącymi nadchodzących dni. W każdym wydaniu prowadzący informują, jakiej temperatury należy się spodziewać w najbliższym czasie, jakie może być zachmurzenie i czy spodziewane są opady. BR"Prognoza pogody" emitowana jest w stacji Nowa TV codziennie zaraz po zakończeniu programu informacyjnego "24 godziny". Kolejne wydania prowadzi na zmianę trójka prezenterów: Aleksandra Kot, Paulina Koziejowska i Jarosław Kret. Prognozę dla Nowej TV przygotowuje Biuro Prognoz Aura

programme.title: Zranione uczucia
programme.desc: Mała Rita (Mel Maia) w dramatycznych okolicznościach traci ojca. Bezwzględna macocha (Adriana Esteves) i jej przyjaciel porzucają ją na wysypisku śmieci, gdzie musi walczyć o przetrwanie. Tam nawiązuje liczne przyjaźnie i odnajduje miłość swojego życia. Wkrótce zostaje adoptowana przez małżeństwo z Argentyny. Po wielu latach już dorosła Rita (Débora Falabella), pod imieniem Nina, wraca w rodzinne strony, by zemścić się za krzywdy z przeszłości(n)

Kolejne wydania prowadzi na zmianę trójka prezenterów: Aleksandra Kot, Paulina Koziejowska i Jarosław Kret. Prognozę dla Nowej TV przygotowuje Biuro Prognoz Aura

programme.title: Zranione uczucia
programme.desc: Mała Rita (Mel Maia) w dramatycznych okolicznościach traci ojca. Bezwzględna macocha (Adriana Esteves) i jej przyjaciel porzucają ją na wysypisku śmieci, gdzie musi walczyć o przetrwanie. Tam nawiązuje liczne przyjaźnie i odnajduje miłość swojego życia. Wkrótce zostaje adoptowana przez małżeństwo z Argentyny. Po wielu latach już dorosła Rita (Débora Falabella), pod imieniem Nina, wraca w rodzinne strony, by zemścić się za krzywdy z przeszłości(n)

programme.title: George Lopez
programme.sub-title: George Gets Caught in a Powers Play

programme.title: George Lopez

programme.desc: Funella has written the beginning to a new song to welcome guests into the Furchester Hotel. It's very very catchy. So catchy that it instantly gets stuck in Harvey P Dull's head and it's really getting on his nerves. Furgus suggests that he takes a walk in the garden to clear his head, but that doesn't work. Cookie Monster tries singing him a new song, the Cookie Cookie Yum Yum song but that doesn't work either. Elmo suggests that he tries counting, which works for a little while, but then the song comes back into his head! But the Furchester's can solve any problem and when it seems that Harvey can't take it anymore; Funella announces that she has finished the welcome song!
